entry.summary:
Token incentives explained, by @Jamiescript We feel smarter already! 🤓
Jamiebones: #30daysoftext Day 19 Explain how token incentives work. In the vibrant ecosystem of web3, tokens serve as the magic fuel powering numerous projects. Consider a project, such as a decentralized game or a DAO. To thrive, it requires users, developers, and contributors.

The Bitcoin of data? Sounds intriguing 🤔
